3pParseAllABPHideFiltersPrompt1.description: English: Parse and enforce Adblock+ element hiding filters.

3pParseAllABPHideFiltersInfo.message:
אפשרות זו מאפשרת פירסור ואיפשור של מסנני “ההסתרת האלמנטים” התואמים ל Adblock Plus. מסננים אלו הם קוסמטיים, הם נועדו להסתיר אלמנטים בדף אשר נחשבים למטרד חזותי, ואשר לא יכולים להיחסם על ידי מנוע חסימת בקשות רשת.

הפעלת פיצ'ר זה מעלה את צריכת הזיכרון של Nano
3pParseAllABPHideFiltersInfo.description: Describes the purpose of the 'Parse and enforce cosmetic filters' feature.

3pIgnoreGenericCosmeticFilters.description: This will cause uBO to ignore all generic cosmetic filters.

3pIgnoreGenericCosmeticFiltersInfo.message:
מסננים קוסמטיים כלליים הם המסננים הקוסמטיים אשר מיועדים להיות מוחלים על כל דפי האינטרנט.

למרות ש Nano מטפל בהם ביעילות, מסננים קוסמטיים כללים יכולים להכביד על הזיכרון וה CPU בדפי אינטרנט מסוימים, בעיקר לדפי אינטרנט גדולים ובעלי חיים ארוכים.

אפשור הגדרה זו תמנע את השימוש הרב בזיכרון וב CPU אשר נוספים לדפי אינטרנט כתוצאה משימוש במסננים קוסמטיים כלליים, וגם תוריד את צריכת הזיכרון של Nano עצמו.

מומלץ לאפשר הגדרה זו במכשירים חלשים יותר.
3pIgnoreGenericCosmeticFiltersInfo.description: Describes the purpose of the 'Ignore generic cosmetic filters' feature.

nano_l_filter_converted_to_exception.message: Nano converted this rule to an exception rule because it only contain negated domains.

nano_l_filter_discarded_non_negatable_ty.message: Nano discarded the type option '{{type}}' because it cannot be negated.

nano_l_filter_unsupported_type_ignored.message: Nano discarded type options that are not yet supported.
nano_l_filter_unsupported_type_ignored.description: Warning when unsupported type options discarded but not entire rule

nano_l_filter_resource_not_found.message: The resource '{{res}}' could not be found, is it spelled correctly?

nano_l_filter_comment_bracket.message: Using '[' to denote comment is deprecated, use '!' instead.

nano_l_filter_mp4_option.message: The use of the option 'mp4' is deprecated, write out the full options instead.

nano_l_filter_aborted_e.message: Nano did not scan the rest of the lines for errors because there are too many errors.

nano_l_filter_ag_js_injection.message: Raw JavaScript injection is not accepted due to security concerns.

nano_l_filter_bad_selector.message: The selector in this rule has syntax errors.
nano_l_filter_bad_selector.description: Error when selector has syntax errors

nano_l_filter_too_expensive.description: Error when expensive rule is generic

nano_l_filter_style_injection_syntax_err.message: This CSS injection rule has syntax errors.

nano_l_filter_assets_access_violation.message: Unprivileged filters may not reference privileged resources.
nano_l_filter_assets_access_violation.description: Error when unprivileged filter references a privileged resources

nano_l_filter_localhost_entry.message: This host file entry is discarded because it is localhost declaration.

nano_l_filter_ag_element_remove.message: Element remove rules with AdGuard syntax are not yet supported, use '##^' instead.
nano_l_filter_ag_element_remove.description: Error when AdGuard style element remove rule

nano_l_filter_negated_generichide.message: The options 'generichide', 'ghide', and 'elemhide' cannot be negated.

nano_l_filter_unknown_option.description: English: The option '{{option}}' is not recognized.

nano_l_filter_only_unsupported_type.message: A type option is not yet supported.
nano_l_filter_only_unsupported_type.description: Error when unsupported type option used and entire rule discarded

nano_l_filter_bad_re.message: This network rule has regular expression syntax errors.
nano_l_filter_bad_re.description: Error when network has regular expression syntax errors

nano_l_filter_intervention_smed79.message: The domain anchor may not be immediately followed by '^'.

nano_r_no_type.message: Nano discarded the option 'redirect=...' because it requires a type option.

nano_r_too_many_types.message: Nano discarded the option 'redirect=...' because it has too many type options.
nano_r_too_many_types.description: Warning when 'redirect=' has too many types

nano_r_no_resource_token.message: Nano discarded the option 'redirect=...' because it has no arguments.

nano_r_no_supported_type.message: Nano discarded the option 'redirect=...' because it has no supported type option.
nano_r_no_supported_type.description: Warning when 'redirect=' has no supported type

nano_r_negated_domain.message: Nano discarded a negated domain because it cannot be used with the option 'redirect=...'.
nano_r_negated_domain.description: Warning when negated domain used with 'redirect='

nano_r_no_destination.message: Nano discarded the option 'redirect=...' because it has no valid destination domain.

nano_r_redirect_in_exception.message: The option 'redirect=...' cannot be used in exception rules.

nano_r_does_not_match_re.message: Nano discarded the option 'redirect=...' because this network rule does not match this regular expression: {{regexp}}
nano_r_does_not_match_re.description: Warning when 'redirect=' failed initial test, use '{{regexp}}' to denote the tester if needed
